sentences.english: Her face flushed when she noticed my paying attention to her.
sentences.chinese: 当她发现我关注她时，脸唰的红了。

sentences.english: To get rid of them, clean the entire sink area with a disinfectant.
sentences.chinese: 要把他们除掉，用消毒剂清唰水池的入口周围。

sentences.english: Then there was another swish and another long flash of bluish light, this time alongside the boat.
sentences.chinese: 后来又有唰唰声，另外，蓝灯，这船边长时间闪烁。

sentences.english: With a swoop of his shining ax the third tree fell.
sentences.chinese: 他的利斧唰地砍向了小树，第三棵树倒下了。

sentences.english: Two of us' eyes were like the lamp lamp of electricity, the Shua shines come.
sentences.chinese: 我俩眼睛就像通了电的灯泡似的，唰就亮起来了。

sentences.english: I sat in my room that day , watching the falling leafs outside the window.
sentences.chinese: 那天我又坐在屋里，看着窗外的树叶唰唰啦啦地飘落。

sentences.english: Her face flooded with color; her eyes welled with tears of delight.
sentences.chinese: 她的脸唰一下就红了，高兴得热泪盈眶。

sentences.english: Once I listen to immediately picked up a pen and write up scratching noises.

sentences.english: Snape paled at the sight of her scar.
